page.title: 08Education (continued.)
page.content:
The village school now named Brereton C.of E.(Aided)Primary School has within its grounds a{Play-group.}This is housed in a purpose built classroom on the playground.The group has been in operation for about four years and is very well attended every morning of the week. The children who live out of the village are{transported}to and from the school by coach. The coach firm have been doing this since 1933.
The school is the{centre}of the village both geographically and socially as it doubles as the Village Hall.Many{organisations}use its facil- ities,these include;Cubs and Scouts, Guides and Brownies,a Popmobility group,the W.I.and various church groups as well many village social events.
